website_summaries.verdict: This LG over-the-range option looks great with most kitchen decor, and offers enough space for cooking large dishes in an easy-to-clean unit.
pros: ft., this model has enough space to prepare dishes for large families or get-togethers
LG keeps the easy-to-clean rounded interior on this model
We love the sleek design of this model, which will match the color scheme of most kitchens
cons: A model of this size is designed only for over-the-range use, and is impractical for use on kitchen countertops

customer_reviews.title: Dead at 3-1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: Liked the microwave overall, unbelievably quiet. LED range hood light was way too dim but that was really my biggest complaint - until today, when it decided it just wasn't going to work. The microwave this replaced was almost 40 years old, and still worked fine. If this is their idea of modern reliability, well, LG will be at the bottom of my list for replacement ~this~ time :-(
customer_reviews.author: Oldsmagnet

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, not terribly loud with nice light coverage ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, not terribly loud with nice light coverage for the range below. The touch controls will take some getting used to, but overall we are very happy with this oven.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It really looks even better up front of you it has a vent that pulls out to catch the steam from boiling water
customer_reviews.author: Dont_get-Fooled-Again

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Im liking my new microwave a lot so far. We did a kitchen remodel and added this above our stove. Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Lg Magic
customer_reviews.text: I lucked out I bought the same model microwave that I had installed so all I had to do was take down the old microwave use the same brackets and the same screws next thing you know I’m cooking for a family of 10 this is a great microwave and I believe that it’s been one of the best microwaves I ever owned
customer_reviews.author: jonathan cash

customer_reviews.title: The microwave is great - except for the damage done in shipping
customer_reviews.text: The microwave is great - except for the damage done in shipping! Still working on trying to resolve that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Westerberg

customer_reviews.title: Works great.. hope it last longer than the last one.
customer_reviews.text: Works great.. hope it last longer than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cilento

customer_reviews.title: The exhaust fan works well when you need it, ...
customer_reviews.text: The exhaust fan works well when you need it, I would give this oven 5 stars except for the slow response of the command buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Super micro machine
customer_reviews.text: Not only I bought this micro oven, but fridge, and gas race as well appliance from this vendor and I cannot be happier. It arrived on time, it was delivered straight into my garage and the product arrived as described. The micro over look shard and work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works well. I'd really give it 4.5 stars as the touch panel is not sensitive enough (press & hold the button rather than pecking at it), but works OK once you quit trying to go too fast with the input. Installed quite easily too.
customer_reviews.author: fatherreilly

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE LOOKING. THE DIGITAL FUNCTION BUTTONS ARE HARD TO ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE LOOKING. THE DIGITAL FUNCTION BUTTONS ARE HARD TO PUSH. TOO INSENSITIVE. YOU HAVE TO PUSH THE BUTTONS 2 TO 3 TIMES ON THE AVERAGE TO GET THEM INPUT.
customer_reviews.author: lavonne kassebaum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Easy to install, one guy can do it if careful. Great microwave
customer_reviews.author: Thomas deems

customer_reviews.title: It arrived a day early.
customer_reviews.text: The microwave arrived a day early, everything was included, and its in great shape. Here's a hint: Leave the protective tape and cardboard on the door, it saves a battle with the extended hood..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will be contacting you about problem with the sensor ...
customer_reviews.text: I will be contacting you about problem with the sensor in the door , appliance won't work unless You push on the door after closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Vera B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit. Love the fan as it extends out and takes care of steam and smoke from the front burners. Its no louder than my old hood fan but works great. All the old one did was make noise :) The under hood lights are bright so now I can see what I am preparing. So glad we chose this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A.

customer_reviews.title: Package looked like it had been opened and repacked before arriving.
customer_reviews.text: Came with case damaged and not working; likely a DOA from another customer who like me checked it for working before installation where having it repaired under warranty would have been a better option than returning it. I did purchase another unit from the same outfit and it arrived undamaged and worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice microwave
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Like the hood feature. Arrived without any dents.
customer_reviews.author: Ivon

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this microwave it is the best one I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Shirley P. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor reliability
customer_reviews.text: The microwave itself has been working for the last 3 years, relatively quiet and with acceptable performance. However The components are made of cheap materials and are prone to failure. So far I have had to replace the top and bottom door covers, vent grill cover, door handle and spring latch. Sometimes the microwave controls freeze and I have to unplug and plug it in again. "Appliances Made to Last" - I don't think so, though other LG products I bought at roughly the same time haven't given as many problems.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Zarate Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Mine quit heating at exactly the 3 year mark. Pretty expensive for 3 years of moderate use. I loved it till then. Almost like it has a timer to die on the 3 year mark😡
customer_reviews.author: crazy4wings

customer_reviews.title: Touch pad buttons stopped working until unplugged to reset.
customer_reviews.text: Several times the touch buttons across the door have stopped working. I am wondering if anyone else has had this problem? We have to unplug the unit to reset it. Please respond if you have this issue. We have only had this unit for six months. Our previous GE microwave never had this problem or any other model that I can recall.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisG

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Megaton went out on our after only 1 1/2 years old. Expensive to Repair. If you buy it also buy an extended warranty. Closest repair center 100 miles. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Dahl

customer_reviews.title: LG appliances are absolute crap. Two years after purchasing
customer_reviews.text: LG appliances are absolute crap. Two years after purchasing, the keyboard broke. E-mailed LG who promised to send a new part, but did nothing and refused to answer e-mails and calls. Lousy products and worthless customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Drew W.

customer_reviews.title: Anyone who has bought this obviously has the bracket that ...
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has bought this obviously has the bracket that it comes with to mount micro on the wall.whats the dimensions of that bracket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAD UNIT!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is only 6 months old and quit working!!! I should be glad since you can't see in the oven while cooking due to the touch pad background covering half the door and unless you are 6'3" or over you can't see anything. Now, lets see if LG has a warranty that works or not!!!!! UPDATE! Still waiting for LG to get tech to look at the microwave! Been down for over a week now and after calls to Amazon, LG and service center who was to schedule us for today. I took off work to be home but now am told it will be at least next wednesday!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Van Vactor

customer_reviews.title: I bought a house with a brand new microwave and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a house with a brand new microwave and I used it once and it would not work again. After a long process with Lg and the service guy it was finally fixed. I had to track down where it was bought and who bought it because they needed the original receipt that took about 3 months. Now my 1 yr warrenty is up and it will not work at all. It counts down but never starts cooking! So confused on what to buy since it is a matching set but very upsetting a $429 microwave didn't last a year!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy V

customer_reviews.title: LG Products suck..
customer_reviews.text: LG Products suck...don't buy them! If you have to repair anything... LG contact 3 party contractor and takes your money! NO Service and No refund! Lost a customer for Life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LG LMHM2237ST 2.2 Cubic Feet Over-The-Range Microwave Oven, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: When you're cooking for company, you need a microwave that starts out looking good -- and stays looking good. LG's 2.2 cu. ft. microwave handles that family-sized casserole, and looks good doing it, with sleek, intuitive SmoothTouch controls located on the front of the stylish glass door. Cleanup is a breeze, thanks to EasyClean interior's stain-resistant technology.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars53 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
